title: Web Clip (com.apple.webClip.managed)
description: The profile that configures web clips on the device.

Label.title: Label
Label.description: The name of the web clip that the system displays on the Home Screen.

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The URL of the web clip.

IsRemovable.title: Removable
IsRemovable.description: If 'true', the system enables removing the web clip.

Precomposed.title: Precomposed Icon
Precomposed.description: If 'true', the system prevents SpringBoard from adding shine to the icon.

FullScreen.title: Full Screen
FullScreen.description: If 'true', the system launches the web clip as a full-screen web app.

IgnoreManifestScope.title: Ignore Web Clip manifest scope
IgnoreManifestScope.description: If 'true', a full screen web clip can navigate to an external web site without showing Safari UI. Otherwise, Safari UI appears when navigating away from the web clip's URL. This key has no effect when 'FullScreen' is 'false'. Available in iOS 14 and later.

TargetApplicationBundleIdentifier.title: Target Application Bundle Identifier
TargetApplicationBundleIdentifier.description: The application bundle identifier of the application that opens the URL. To use this property, install the profile through MDM. Available in iOS 14 and later.
